subject: Automobile Racing
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: A driver died in a four-vehicle accident at Toledo Speedway that sent the rear of his car slamming into a wall at about 110 miles per hour. Terry Gibson, a 46-year-old from LaRue, Ohio, died at the scene Friday night, according to the Lucas County coroner’s office.
